translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

With your letter of the 8th of the current month have arrived the 390 horses that Your Lordship Fidêncio Machado, who admirably carried out this duty, for the said horses arrived very well cared for. Your Lordship

God keep Your Lordship Secretariat of the Treasury in Piratini, January 10, 1839. Domingos José de Almeida

Most Illustrious Sir João Antônio da Silveira. Commander of the Right Division.
